a.title: black and white picture of graduates

img.alt: black and white picture of graduates

div.p: Welcome to Williston Public School District #1!

p.span:
The vision of Williston Public School District #1 is to welcome and celebrate the individuality of the students, staff, parents, and community. We educate with passion in a safe and respectful environment. We strive to educate with the highest level of technology. We pledge to prepare students to graduate and achieve personal success.
Our mission is to prepare students to be successful at the next level of education, work, and life.

div.p: Our district consists of 6 elementary schools. Hagan Elementary, Lewis and Clark Elementary, McVay Elementary, Rickard Elementary, and Wilkinson Elementary all serve Kindergarten-4th grade. Bakken Elementary includes 5th & 6th grade. There is also Williston Middle School (7th & 8th grade), Williston High School, and Del Easton Alternative High School.

br.span:
